name: Leonin
description: The Leonin are unheard of outside of Asura, where they dominate the central plains of the continent. They are a proud, nomadic people who travel in small clans (that they call Prides), following the herds that they hunt for food. Like the other beast walker races of Asura, they are the product of Sorceron experiments in ancient days, a merging of human and lion.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Leonin are typically over 6 feet tall, with some standing over 7 feet. Your size is Medium.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution increases by 2 and your Strength increases by 1.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Claws
traits.description: Your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you can deal slashing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

traits.name: Hunter's Instincts
traits.description: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Athletics, Intimidation, Perception, or Survival.

traits.name: Daunting Roar
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can let out an especially menacing roar. Creature of your choice within 10 feet of you that can hear you must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of you until the end of your next turn. The DC of the save equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.
